item.title: Telling git To Use Specific Private Key
item.description: Sometimes, you need to use specific keys. To do it, use ssh config, something like below in ~/.ssh/config host github.com HostName github.com IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github User git See details in https://superuser.com/questions/232373/how-to-tell-git-which-private-key-to-use
